page.title: 04Concerns and Opinions-S/moor
page.content: When we surveyed people in Spennymoor about the biggest problem faced by any government in Britain, 78% of the people we interviewed said{ {unemployment.}6% said{vandalism. }1.5% said{taxation}and{inflation.}0.75% said{burglary}and {drugs.}2.5% said {wages.}Other things mentioned were {litter, strikes and poverty. } When we asked, "If you were able to bring in a new law what would it be? 31% said they would bring back {capital punishment;} 16% said they would like to see the{birch in use; 79% said they would like to see something that would{stop vandalism. 4% said{earlier retirement}was important and another 4% said bring back{conscription. Equal rights,drug {abuse,full employment}and{violence {laws}were all chosen as well.
